page.title: 03HOUSING IN EASTERN RAUNDS
page.content: The types of houses built in our area are very varied. New estates built recently can be found at RANDS WAY and MANOR FARM. Older terraced housing, built around 1900, can be found in the PARK ROAD, LAWSON STREET and HILL STREET area. PARK AVENUE is an estate of council houses owned by the East Northants District Council. There is a mixture of detached, semi-detached and terraced houses.Most houses are built of brick and some have breeze blocks to give better insulation. Some of the older houses in THORPE STREET are built with stone. Some people have changed the appearance of their houses by putting stone cladding, which is imitation stone, over the bricks. Others have sprayed a tyrolean mix onto the walls. There are no thatched cottages in this area of RAUNDS.
